name: find a crown
description:
Platformer game where you need find a crown, after that you maybe became a good boy

Simple unity 2d-platformer project for education

For movement i used Rigidbody For state Playmaker

Character Art by Bardent

Source:

https://github.com/AlexSulimob/FindACrown

A-D horizontal movement

Space - jump

Left Shift - dash
